mapper.select: select meeting_id from meetings where meeting_id=(select max(meeting_id) from meetings)
mapper.insert: insert into meetings (meeting_id, meeting_title, meeting_content, meeting_time, recruitment_number, applicant_number, user_id, sido_id, sigungu_id, dong_id) values (meeting_id_seq.nextval, #{meetingTitle}, #{meetingContent}, #{meetingTime}, #{recruitmentNumber}, #{applicantNumber}, #{userId}, #{sidoId}, #{sigunguId}, #{dongId})
mapper.update: insert into participants (participant_id, meeting_id, user_id) values (participant_id_seq.nextval, #{meetingId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: delete participants where meeting_id = #{meetingId} and user_id = #{userId}
